data.message: hey fellas here is business, am a song writter and i have writting a lot of songs for a long time now, am interested in selling off my songs and if you are interested to buy from me inbox me. Trust me am your best man and i have the best songs ever that need to be sold, if ya an artist and you interested on my songs please do let me know about it and if ya not an artist this is your best short of becoming one, your chance of being a musician, your chance to be famous, if you are interested in my songs pleast do inbox me and i will make it a low price.
